title: Email local folders have disappeared
content: I recently did a Thunderbird update and now all of the local folders in my email account have disappeared.
creator: nalderis

title: Thunderbird suddenly no longer downloads my emails
content:
I'm running Thunderbird ver. 120.12.0 on a Mac Pro (2019) running Mac OS X ver. 13.4 (Ventura). About 48-hours ago from the time of this note, Thunderbird ceased to download my email for a designated POP email server.

The settings and passwords are correct. I even see the message that it is downloading my emails, but the reality is that no email is downloaded.

I can send messages from Thunderbird, bit I can't receive any.

Is there a solution for this problem?
creator: sdupree

title: mailing lists
content:
Installed the BETA and the address books did not set up as they were in in the old version - basically not labeled - figured out how to get them labeled. Mailing lists or labels in Gmail, did not import - how do i get them to import without having to recreate them?

~Scott
creator: slang10967
